content:
hi, i had a couple of questions:
1. is there an ethereum light client in production or being worked on that tracks the full Eth valset and not just the sync committee?
2. are there any updates/developments on implementing slashing within the Altair spec? i found this open issue (https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/issues/3321) but couldn't find any ongoing work related to this. is it even worth implementing slashing for the sync committee?
